title: Create Alias in Collection view of new Admin UI not working
description:
When creating a new alias in the Collections view of the new admin UI, the alias is not created properly. Instead of the names of the collections chosen from the list, the alias is created as "object Object". 

If I create, for instance, an alias "test" and choose one collection from the list shown in the UI, the alias shows in the clusterstatus (i.e. http://host:port/solr/admin/collections?action=CLUSTERSTATUS) as 

"aliases":
{"test":"[object Object]"}

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: Closed as duplicate in favor of SOLR-9032. If this is in error, please reopen.
